Kick-off is at 9:00 PM CET, but the club is offering fans the opportunity to follow the pre-match build-up, including the players’ warm-up, starting at 7:45 PM. Watch the live stream here:

arts.ttl: PSG plot 'surprise Barcelona free transfer swoop' next summer
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain face FC Barcelona this Wednesday 1st October in the Champions League. And, precisely, the French club are reportedly considering recruiting a player from their rivals for free during the next summer transfer window.
